name: A Heart of Steel and Fire
name_original: A Heart of Steel and Fire
description:
A Heart of Steel and Fire

Created exclusively during the month of March, 'A Heart of Steel and Fire' is a captivating romance and love-triangle story that follows the lives of three superheroes as they struggle to balance their duties, passions, and personal relationships. Immerse yourself in this thrilling tale of heroism and love, and discover where your heart truly lies.

Presenting Chapter 1, this is just the beginning of an epic journey. If the response is positive and fans crave more, the story will continue to unfold with additional chapters. Dive into the world of 'A Heart of Steel and Fire' and let your adventure begin!

Tools used:

  • Traditional:
    • Ren'Py (Visual Novel Engine)
    • Krita (Digital Art)
    • Audacity (Audio Editing)
  • AI:
    • ChatGPT by OpenAI (Code Assistance)
    • Replica Studios (AI-Generated Audio)
    • Stable Diffusion (AI-Generated Assets)

Disclaimer: This project was originally intended for NaNoRenO 2023. However, the use of AI during development is forbidden for the official Jam. As such, I decided to adhere to the spirit of finishing a visual novel within a month without submitting it to the official Jam. This project makes extensive use of AI, and I honestly couldn't have completed it within the given timeframe without it. While I understand the reasons behind banning AI assistance from the official Jam, I am grateful for the opportunity to finish this project within the given time limit. Was it worth it? I'll let you be the judge

Thank you for playing!
